Name: The Crane Trials: Red Edition
About the game: The Crane Trials: Red Edition is the first chapter of the multi-chapter Crane Trial series. The game revolves around trying to escape each area that you are put in. In this chapter the player will attempt to escape his house that he was locked in after waking up and not remembering anything other than the fact the he must escape.
